summary: This release introduces Loam, Grove's new name protection system that helps keep the community safe from offensive usernames. The workshop page received major enhancements with floating icon navigation and expanded sub-icons across multiple features. Testing coverage improved with comprehensive unit tests for pricing utilities, and several accessibility fixes ensure Grove remains welcoming for all users.

features: Loam name protection system with domain blocklist
Floating icon navigation on workshop page
Enhanced GroveDivider with rotation and spacing props
Clickable ZDR sub icons with help article
Mobile footer redesign with overflow menu
Glass dividers in desktop and mobile UI
fixes: Tailwind content paths for engine package
Body scroll cleanup to prevent stuck states
Type errors updated to Svelte 5 patterns
Screen reader support for plant icons
Mobile navbar black boxes from scroll-shadow
